title.rendered: Happy Mother’s Day flower arrangements for Mum

content.rendered:
HAPPY MOTHER’S DAY!

Celebrate Mother’s Day with LULLY & ROSE flowers and gifts designed to make mum happy

Mother’s Day is a special occasion to celebrate and show appreciation for all the maternal figures in our lives, from mums to grandparents, stepmothers, and beyond. It’s the perfect time to express your devotion with beautiful happy Mother’s Day flowers and heartfelt gifts.

At LULLY& ROSE, we understand how important it is to make these special women feel cherished and happy. Our range includes a variety of thoughtful gifts and stunning floral arrangements guaranteed to bring smiles. Moreover, let flowers help you honour and celebrate all the amazing mums in your life this happy Mother’s Day.

Celebrate Mother’s Day with flowers that hold meaning

Carnations
As the traditional Mother’s Day flower, carnations offer a timeless choice steeped in history and significance. Thus opt for classic white to honour a cherished mother or mother figure.

Dahlias
We’re fortunate to access stunning dahlias from a local grower in Queensland. Whether in pink, white, latte, apricot, or other hues, dahlias make a splendid choice for Mother’s Day. 

Freesias
Known to symbolise motherly love, pink freesias emit a delicate fragrance reminiscent of baby powder. Infuse your mum’s home with their sweet scent this Mother’s Day.

Hyacinth
With associations of peace and beauty, hyacinths make a lovely floral for a mum who appreciates elegance and devotion. Their fragrance is instantly captivating. Moreover, receiving a gift of fresh hyacinth is sure to put a smile on anyone’s face and spread happiness all around.

Paperwhite Narcissus
Similar to daffodils, these flowers perfumed petals and star-shaped blooms, adding a touch of respect and charm to you gift. bouquet, Paperwhite Narcissus, akin to daffodils and jonquils, boasts perfumed petals and star-shaped blooms 

Phalaenopsis orchid plants
For green-thumb mum’s who adore houseplants, a graceful phalaenopsis orchid in a white ceramic planter makes a lasting impression.

Roses
A timeless symbol of love and admiration, roses offer a classic choice for Mother’s Day. Opt for pink for sweetness or apricot or lemon for friendship, devotion, and happiness.

 

Mother’s Day

Mother’s Day is a special occasion dedicated to showing appreciation for the most important woman in your life – your mother. What better way to express your love and gratitude than with a beautiful flowers? At LULLY & ROSE, we offer a range of unique and stunning happy Mother’s Day flowers that are perfect for celebrating your mum on this special day. In this article, we’ll showcase some of our most popular arrangements and give you ideas on how to make them extra special.

Gifting fresh flowers is a timeless and classic way to show your appreciation. Whether you choose an en masse bouquet of her favorite flowers or a stunning vase arrangement, fresh flowers are a beautiful and thoughtful gift that never goes out of style. They not only add color and beauty to any room but also uplift spirits and brighten the space.

At LULLY & ROSE, we understand the timeless beauty and significance of fresh flowers and plants as gifts, especially on happy Mother’s Day. We take pride in providing only the freshest and most beautiful seasonal flowers, ensuring that every bouquet and posy reflects the love and appreciation you have for your mother.

 

Potted orchid plant

Now let’s talk about potted orchids. They’re a timeless and sophisticated choice for happy Mother’s Day flowers, and furthermore, the perfect gift for our green-thumbed mums.

These elegant flowering plants come in a variety of hues, from crisp whites to vibrant purple tones, making them versatile gifts that can suit any taste. Not only are they visually stunning, but phalaenopsis are also relatively easy to care for, making them ideal for mums with busy lifestyles. To ensure your orchid thrives, place it in indirect sunlight and water it weekly during the growing season. These luxury florals can last for several weeks, or even months with proper care, ultimately reminding your mum of your care and appreciation long after the holiday has passed.

Consider placing the orchid in a well-lit bathroom or kitchen, where the humidity is higher, to help mimic its natural environment. This thoughtful touch will not only beautify her space but also enhance the longevity of the blooms.You can view our selection of happy Mother’s Day flowers, including potted orchid plants, here.

 

Phalaenopsis orchid stems

For a more personal gift, consider our phalaenopsis orchid stems, which exude luxury and elegance—perfect for your mum. These stems not only add a touch of elegance to any space but also symbolise love, beauty, and strength. With proper care, these stunning happy flowers can remain vibrant for several weeks after Mother’s Day, continually reminding your mum of your appreciation and affection.

Our cut phalaenopsis stems are a beautiful and elegant way to express your love and gratitude. For those seeking a minimalist and modern Mother’s Day gift, these orchid stems are an excellent choice. Enhance this special gift with our elegant Marmoset Found glass vase, adding a personal and thoughtful touch that highlights the orchid’s delicate yet bold appearance. This combination not only enhances the beauty of the blooms but also makes your gift deeply personal.

Choose this perfect way to acknowledge your mum’s beauty and strength. Known for their longevity, phalaenopsis orchids are an enduring gift that she can enjoy for weeks, adding a touch of luxury and elegance to her surroundings. Explore our assortment of phalaenopsis orchid stems, perfect as happy Mother’s Day flowers, right here.

 

Designer bouquet

Designer Bouquets

$135.00 – $280.00 incl GST

"Designer Bouquets | White & Pink Roses, Stock, Delphinium | Peach & Lemon Roses, Orchids, Daffodils | Burgundy Roses, Dahlias | Gold Coast Flower Delivery

Our bouquets are a true reflection of the beauty and artistry possible with flowers. Each bouquet features a carefully curated mix of premium flowers, ensuring that the colours and textures harmonize perfectly.

Our designer bouquet, inspired by contemporary Melbourne and Sydney trends, is a popular choice for Mothers who love flowers and appreciate the finer things in life. Each is uniquely designed and styled by us, showcasing the best flowers available on the day. A beautiful, happy and seasonal gift that mum is sure to love and admire this Mother’s Day.

Additionally, each bouquet comes wrapped in our signature LULLY & ROSE paper and trailing ribbon, adding an extra touch of elegance to your gift.

Our bouquets are the perfect way to show your mum how much you care. With their stunning beauty and thorough attention to detail, they are sure to make your mum feel happy, appreciated and loved this Mother’s Day.

In each bouquet, you’ll find an exquisite selection of blooms, from delicate reflexed roses to colourful dahlias, carefully chosen to create a stunning visual display that will captivate your mum’s heart. Additionally, you can view our selection of designer bouquets here. Offering an assortment of colourful and happy Mother’s Day flowers artfully crafted to express your heartfelt wishes.

 

Floral bowl

Floral Bowl

$165.00 incl GST

Introducing our Floral Bowl, the sweetest present. A delightful table arrangement featuring a posy of seasonal florals to admire and adorn any tabletop in your living space, accompanied by a designer vase from ‘Marmoset Found‘ Australia. Presented with our signature gift box and trailing ribbon. The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we...

Elevate your happy Mother’s Day flower gifting with our exquisite designer floral bowl, a perfect blend of aesthetics and functionality. Featuring both flowers to enjoy and a vase to keep in your home, it offers a delightful experience for your mum.

The hand-cast ceramic vase provides a 360-degree view of the flowers, making it suitable for any space within your home. The mix of seasonal flowers within our floral bowl showcases a harmonious blend of colours and textures, creating a true work of floral art.

The ceramic ‘cloud bubble vase,’ designed in Australia by ‘Marmoset Found‘, is a stunning piece of art that adds a touch of elegance to any room.

Our floral bowl is a perfect happy Mother’s Day flower gift for mums who adore entertaining guests. It serves as a beautiful centrepiece for a dinner party or a special occasion, with the flowers expertly arranged for the recipient’s convenience.

In addition to their beauty, some of the flowers also emit a delightful fragrance, enhancing the ambiance of your home.

Our floral bowl arrangement is a statement piece that will bring joy and beauty to any room it is placed in, making your mum feel happy, appreciated, and loved. With its timeless elegance and captivating fragrance, it’s a gift that will be treasured for years to come. Additionally serving as a loving reminder of your appreciation for mum. Moreover, click here to browse our floral bowl options, thoughtfully designed to bring beauty to your home with happy and sweet Mother’s Day flowers.

 

 Signature posies

Signature Posies

$115.00 – $260.00 incl GST

 

Our designer posies offer a thoughtful way to demonstrate your attention to detail for mum. These posies are smaller and more intimate than our other flowers. Featuring a beautiful mix of seasonal, perfumed florals arranged in a stunning hand-tied bouquet.

Inspired by European trends, particularly the shorter English garden-style posy, they’re ideal for those who appreciate all things floral and beautiful. Each posy exudes visual charm and fragrant allure.

For an extra special touch, consider pairing our signature posy with a box of chocolates, a bottle of French champagne, or a beautiful perfumed candle, creating the ultimate Mother’s Day gift that mum will truly cherish.

Our designer posies embody the essence of care and attention to detail, making them the perfect choice for a mum who appreciates life’s finer things. Furthermore, you can view our selection of signature posies here. Offering a elegant array of fresh happy Mother’s Day flowers destined to brighten her spirits.

 

Happy Mother’s Day flowers 

Explore our range of unique and romantic Mother’s Day flowers at LULLY & ROSE, designed with every mum, daughter, friend, and grandma in mind. Choose from our diverse collection of floral designs, with Mother’s day cards and greetings, to honor this special day with love and gratitude. Browse through our wide array of floral arrangements to find the perfect gift that will truly make your mother feel special and loved. Our selection ensures you effortlessly discover the ideal gift. Whether it’s orchid plants or breathtaking fresh flowers, we have everything you need. Explore our beautiful collection for inspiration and heartfelt messages to express your love and appreciation. Shop now and make her day extra special. Thank you for choosing LULLY & ROSE. Additionally, explore our range of fresh flowers for our assortment of happy Mother’s Day gifts, here.
